 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַר‎</span> **verb** ==interpret== (dream), only [[Gen.40.41|Gen 40:41]] (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּתַר‎</span>; apparently = Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּשַׁר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***dissolve***, figurative ***solve, interpret***, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵּשֶׁר‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַר‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Gen.40.22|Gen 40:22]]; [[Gen.41.13|Gen 41:13]] absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתָ֑ר‎</span> [[Gen.40.16|Gen 40:16]]; [[Gen.41.12|Gen 41:12]] with accusative of thing: ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְתָּרלָֿנוּ‎</span> [[Gen.41.12|Gen 41:12]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְתֹּר‎</span> [[Gen.41.15|Gen 41:15]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּתֵר‎</span> [[Gen.40.8|Gen 40:8]]; [[Gen.41.15|Gen 41:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.41.8|Gen 41:8]].
